name: fr-BE+nl-BE_JOURNEY_GAR_Branded Commercial_2022_08_HPVReinbursmentofBoys-Launch1

metaData.label: GP-PHARMA
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal General Medicine OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pharmacist Other

metaData.label: SP
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal Obstetrics Gynaecology OR ( SPECIALTY_1 equal Medical Assistant AND SPECIALTY_2 equal Obstetrics Gynaecology ) OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Dermatology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Urology OR ( SPECIALTY_1 equal Paediatrics AND language equal fr-BE ) OR ( SPECIALTY_1 equal Medical Assistant AND SPECIALTY_2 equal Paediatrics AND language equal fr-BE )
